basics.name: Steve Schrab
basics.label: Senior Front-End Engineer
basics.summary: For 20+ years I have been professionally building websites and webapps. Evolving my skill set along with the industry trends in web technologies. My team relies on me to not only have strong front end development skills, but also to bring solutions and ideas to whatever project we're working on. You will find me to be passionate, trustworthy, and personable. The type of person whom you can rely on.

work.summary: Built and maintained a User Interface component library for new web applications in use by Thomson Reuters North American Wealth Management branch. Components and Applications were built on Angular 6/TypeScript stack.
Worked as a Front-End Developer consultant at Johnson Controls building the UI for their next generation water plant optimization tools using HTML, CSS, Angular 2/TypeScript.

Front-end development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript/jQuery. Responsible for coming up with consistency guidelines for other Front-End developers. Served as a leader and mentor to other developers. Participated in creative and user-experience brainstorms to develop creative approaches to technology and traditional marketing platforms. Building responsive websites from a designerâ€™s static PSD files. Making logical choices for breakpoint decisions. Experience working in Drupal and Django's Template Language. Experience building front-end interfaces for mobiles apps in iOS and Android using React Native. Working with clients such as Harley-Davidson, Harley Owners Group, Mercury Marine, SRAM, and Zoom Audio.

Front-end development using HTML, CSS, JavaScript/jQuery, and Flash/ActionScript. Working with clients such as Harley-Davidson, Harley-Davidson Museum, Buell, Brunswick, Mercury Marine, SRAM, Zoom Audio, and Showtime.
Front-end development using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Flash/ActionScript. Working with clients such as Harley-Davidson, Buell Motorcycles, SRAM, and US Bank. (EKG was acquired in 2004 by GS Design)
Front-end development using HTML, CSS, and Flash/ActionScript. Worked with clients such as Briggs & Stratton and Bridgestone/Firestone.

Interface design for web sites and interactive CD-ROMs, CD-ROM programming, front-end development, video production, 3D modeling, and animation. Did work with clients such as Caterpillar, Piper Aircraft, and The Packer Report.

skills: Experienced front-end development. Building websites in one form or another since 1996.
Able make appropriate judgement calls as to how to interpret a design into code.
Organic SEO using semantic HTML and Microformats.
Proficient in various JavaScript frameworks such as Angular/TypeScript
Experience working within Content Management Systems such as Drupal and Django.
